<Activity mc:Ignorable="sap sap2010 sads" x:Class="Robot_3_-_Email_Automation" mva:VisualBasic.Settings="{x:Null}" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Robot_3_-_Email_Automation_1"

  <TextExpression.ReferencesForImplementation>
    <sco:Collection x:TypeArguments="AssemblyReference">
      <AssemblyReference>mscorlib</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Xml</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>OpenRPA</AssemblyReference>

      <AssemblyReference>Microsoft.Bcl.HashCode</AssemblyReference>

      <AssemblyReference>System.ServiceModel</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.ComponentModel.Composition</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Managed</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Runtime.WindowsRuntime</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>OpenRPA.Office</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Activities</AssemblyReference>
    </sco:Collection>
  </TextExpression.ReferencesForImplementation>
  <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_1">
    <Sequence.Variables>
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Default="MailRobot execution ended" Name="strMailSubject" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Default="marcelocruz_rpa@outlook.com" Name="strMailRecipient" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Default="Robot finished it's execution!" Name="strMailBody" />
    </Sequence.Variables>
    <ooa:GetMails Emails="{x:Null}" Filter="{x:Null}" Folder="\\marcelocruz_rpa@outlook.com\Inbox" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="GetMails_1" MaxResults="10" UnreadOnly="True">
      <ooa:GetMails.Body>
        <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="ooa:email">
          <ActivityAction.Argument>
            <DelegateInArgument x:TypeArguments="ooa:email" Name="item" />
          </ActivityAction.Argument>
          <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_2">
            <Sequence.Variables>
              <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Default="Mail moved successfully!!!" Name="strMailReplyBody" />
            </Sequence.Variables>
            <If Condition="[item.Subject.ToLower.Contains("microsoft")]" DisplayName="If mail subject has the word microsoft" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_1">
              <If.Then>
                <ooa:MoveMailItem Folder="\\marcelocruz_rpa@outlook.com\Microsoft" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="MoveMailItem_1" Mail="[item]" />
              </If.Then>
              <If.Else>
                <If Condition="[item.Subject.ToLower.Contains("amazon")]" DisplayName="If mail subject has the word amazon" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_3">
                  <If.Then>
                    <ooa:MoveMailItem Folder="\\marcelocruz_rpa@outlook.com\Amazon" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="MoveMailItem_2" Mail="[item]" />
                  </If.Then>
                  <If.Else>
                    <If Condition="[item.Subject.ToLower.Contains("apple")]" DisplayName="If mail subject has the word apple" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_2">
                      <If.Then>
                        <ooa:MoveMailItem Folder="\\marcelocruz_rpa@outlook.com\Apple" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="MoveMailItem_3" Mail="[item]" />
                      </If.Then>
                      <If.Else>
                        <ooa:MoveMailItem Folder="\\marcelocruz_rpa@outlook.com\Others" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="MoveMailItem_4" Mail="[item]" />
                      </If.Else>
                    </If>
                  </If.Else>
                </If>
              </If.Else>
            </If>
            <ooa:ReplyMailItem Attachments="{x:Null}" BCC="{x:Null}" CC="{x:Null}" EMail="{x:Null}" HTMLBody="{x:Null}" Subject="{x:Null}" To="{x:Null}" Body="[strMailReplyBody]" Email="[item]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ReplyMailItem_1" ReplyAction="reply" UIAction="SendHidden" />
          </Sequence>
        </ActivityAction>
      </ooa:GetMails.Body>
      <ooa:GetMails.Variables>
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Index" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Total" />
      </ooa:GetMails.Variables>
    </ooa:GetMails>
    <ooa:NewMailItem Account="{x:Null}" Attachments="{x:Null}" BCC="{x:Null}" CC="{x:Null}" EMail="{x:Null}" HTMLBody="{x:Null}" Body="[strMailBody]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="NewMailItem_1" Subject="[strMailSubject]" To="[strMailRecipient]" UIAction="SendHidden" />
    <sads:DebugSymbol.Symbol>dw1DOlxFbXB0eS54YW1sAA==</sads:DebugSymbol.Symbol>
  </Sequence>
  <sap2010:WorkflowViewState.ViewStateManager>
    <sap2010:ViewStateManager>
      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="MoveMailItem_1" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,84" />
      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="MoveMailItem_2" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,84" />
      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="MoveMailItem_3" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,84" />

      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="Sequence_2" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="936,736">
        <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState>

      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="GetMails_1" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="952,869.6">

      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="NewMailItem_1" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="952,60.8" />
